headline: Broadridge Announces Expanded Roles for Senior Leaders
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (NYSE: BR), a global Fintech leader, today announced expanded roles for two senior members of its leadership team to support Broadridge's continued evolution to a platform company. The changes are effective as of July 1.
